featured.text: In view of all these strengths, in the 1930s the United States and Canada undertook a research project in which they managed to breed an especially nutritious soybean with a high oil content.

definition.zh_def: 富含營養的，對健康有益的。
definition.en_def: Providing the substances necessary for growth, health, and good condition.
definition.example: Eating a nutritious breakfast helps to improve concentration throughout the day.
